${ModID}:BonesStomach.NAME: Bones' Stomach
${ModID}:BonesStomach.FLAVOR: Given as a sign of trust, it has always been this empty.

${ModID}:MeatsStomach.NAME: Meat's Stomach
${ModID}:MeatsStomach.FLAVOR: You changed his name to something more fitting.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the start of combat, #ySummon #yMeat.

${ModID}:BoxOfTreats.NAME: Box Of Treats
${ModID}:BoxOfTreats.FLAVOR: Every time you open this, another treat lies within.

${ModID}:ShortLeash.NAME: Short Leash
${ModID}:ShortLeash.FLAVOR: Keep your friends close, and your enemies will be sure to keep their distance.

${ModID}:PaperDaug.NAME: Paper Daug
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with #yTarget take 100% more damage from Companions rather than 50%.

${ModID}:WorldMap.NAME: World Map
${ModID}:WorldMap.FLAVOR: "A well-documented map can do wonders for one's sense of direction." - The Architect
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, after discarding your cards, #yPlan #b

${ModID}:Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang
${ModID}:Boomerang.FLAVOR: There seems to be no way to get rid of it.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn will #yReturn to your hand next turn.

${ModID}:GiftOfGod.NAME: Gift of God
${ModID}:GiftOfGod.FLAVOR: You may have this power, but not what you hoped to obtain through it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle a #yGodly #yPowers into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Spyglass.NAME: Spyglass
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yPlan X while your discard pile is empty, #yScry X + #b
